name: Abyss Legends
description:
YunokiRoom's second fantasy RPG game is here, this time it's made with RPG Maker MV! Abyss Legends continues the adventures of Eclair from Gamerz Chronicles and an new protagonist, the Abyss Child Mitsuru Hirayama.

Characters: 

  • Mitsuru the Abyss Child: An Japanese born in Kenya, also the Abyss Child.
  • Qamar the Moon Prince/Knight: Crescendo and the Moon King's son and Kaguya's younger brother, also an moon prince and knight.
  • Komako the Ice Witch: Haruya, Kotori and Nanami's older sister.
  • Blake the Lost Hero: Eclair's older brother.
  • Eclair the Sword Dancer: Blake's younger sister, also the main character of Gamerz Chronicles
  • Crescendo the Moon Queen: Qamar and Kaguya's mother, also an moon queen and wife of the wicked Moon King.
  • Charlotte the Apprentice: An apprentice of her father, who's an magician.
  • Aidan the Sun Phoenix: An mage who's also an phoenix who uses fire powers.
  • Sango the Pharmacist: The pharmacist from Valhalla.
  • Celine the Flora Archer:  White Bird tamer who wants her white bird back
  • Yusha the Otherworldly Hero: An hero from the otherworld, who's also Blake, Eclair, Aidan, Celine and Charlotte's friend.
